amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to consult with National Council on Radiation Protection and Measurements (NCRP) in preparing guidance and recommendations for protecting emergency responders, recovery networks, and the general public from radiological terrorism, threats, and events.

action.text: Amendment SA 4649 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Chambliss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4649 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
